lever.additional:
About the team: 

Third-Party Platform is Gojek’s fourth product pillar, the future-facing product stream that aims to grow Gojek with new use cases and new users at scale by partnering with third parties. The Platform’s goal is to build a scalable marketplace of consumer solutions that efficiently unlock hundreds of use cases for the consumer super app, that will accelerate Gojek's entry to new industries, markets, and partnerships.

Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description:
About the role: 

We are looking for an entrepreneurial Head of Product to join our Third Party Platform Product Group in Singapore. As a Head of Product, you will drive innovation, execution and product improvements for our entire Third Party Platform.  You will thereby have a pivotal role in enabling external use cases on the Gojek platform and ensure that we stay true to our objective of being the most preferred SuperApp for our customers. An ideal Head of Product will be strong in product design, data and technology. You also need a high empathy for both your customers as well as your colleagues.
lever.descriptionPlain:
About the role: 

We are looking for an entrepreneurial Head of Product to join our Third Party Platform Product Group in Singapore. As a Head of Product, you will drive innovation, execution and product improvements for our entire Third Party Platform.  You will thereby have a pivotal role in enabling external use cases on the Gojek platform and ensure that we stay true to our objective of being the most preferred SuperApp for our customers. An ideal Head of Product will be strong in product design, data and technology. You also need a high empathy for both your customers as well as your colleagues.
lever.text: Head of Product - Third Party Platform

lists.content:
• Lead to develop a road map that will become the foundation of our nascent 3rd Party group of products by conceptualising and evangelising high visibility prioritisation frameworks
  • Define OKRs for your unified data platform and hold your team accountable for setting and achieving their individual OKRs
  • Be outcome driven, everything we do needs metrics. Track these metrics and strive to improve those day in day out
  • Manage and support product managers in your product group, providing them with guidance and mentorship to maximise their potential
  • Recruit, hire and train new team members as you grow your product area
  • Be an effective leader. Partner and collaborate with your stakeholders. Core stakeholders are Data Science, Data Engineering, Business Intelligence, Growth and our Product Groups from Transport and Food and beyond
  • Continue to strive for Innovation. Be aware of innovation that is happening in your domain space
  • Build strategic partnerships with global companies that will give us a competitive edge
  • You must be execution and delivery driven. Delivering solutions on time, on budget matters and most importantly solving customer needs counts
  • We expect our product managers to be great at stakeholder management, prioritisation and project management

• A Bachelor’s / Masters or an equivalent degree, preferably in engineering or management.
  • At least 8 years of total experience, with minimum 6 years of product experience including experience as a group lead managing other product managers
  • Experience as a software engineer / developer and working with distributed teams is highly desired
  • Successful track record in planning, developing and executing strategy for multiple projects while collaborating cross-functionally
  • Ability to easily transition from high level strategic thinking to creative and detailed execution
  • Solid organisation, leadership, team-building, and mentorship experience, fluent in English and are a confident communicator
  • You’re entrepreneurial and are comfortable working in a complex and face-paced environment
  • Analytical and data-driven, you love digging into the data to understand what’s happening and define & measure success on every project
  • You’re passionate about your customers and always bring questions back to what will serve them best
lists.text: What you bring to the role:
